home.title: What would you like to do today?
home.description: Embark on a journey of discovery and connect with a world of exciting events. With Eventify, you are not just attending events; you are experiencing life to its fullest.
home.ai_search_placeholder: AI search: What would you like to do?
home.about_us_text: Eventify is your digital gateway to discovering unique events and social gatherings. We bridge emotions and experiences, connecting people with interesting and fun activities. Discover, share, and enjoy the moments that turn every day into an adventure.
home.services_descr: Discover events that match your passions or create your own.
home.discover_events_descr: Find local events that align with your interests and schedule.
home.create_events_descr: Host and organize your own events and activities in the community.
home.connect_with_others_descr: Meet and connect with people who share your interests.
home.real_time_updates_descr: Stay informed with the latest event details and announcements.
home.easy_management_descr: Easily manage your events and track attendance.
home.support_safety_descr: Dedicated support and safety measures for a worry-free experience.
home.organizer_creates_event_descr: Event organizers can easily set up events, providing all necessary details and images to attract users.
home.user_finds_event: The User Finds the Event and Pays for It
home.user_finds_event_descr: Users browse through a variety of events, select the ones they are interested in, and make secure payments to confirm their participation.
home.organizer_gets_paid: The Organizer Gets Paid for the Event
home.organizer_gets_paid_descr: Once the event is successfully conducted, organizers receive their payments promptly, ensuring a smooth and reliable transaction.
home.work_process_description: Understand the steps from event creation to participation
home.review_1: The events are always top-notch and the community is fantastic. I have never been disappointed!
home.review_2: A great way to discover and connect with new people. The variety of events is amazing!
home.review_3: Absolutely love the user-friendly interface and the event variety. Highly recommended!
home.rates_description: Launch your campaign and benefit from our expertise on designing and managing conversion centered Tailwind CSS html page.
home.hobby_description: Perfect for event participators and hobby event creators.
home.hobby_feature2: Create up to 5 events per month
home.hobby_feature5: Basic and Premium event features disabled
home.basic_description: Perfect for event organizers with up to 20 events/month.
home.basic_feature2: Create up to 20 events per month
home.basic_feature4: Event advertising as add-on with 20% discount
home.premium_description: Perfect for event organizers with lots of events.
home.premium_feature4: All event advertising features are enabled
home.contact_description: Launch your campaign and benefit from our expertise on designing and managing conversion centered Tailwind CSS html page.
